name: 霍弘毅
objective:
(Continuation of German I)
In this class we will earn very basic conversational and informational German; very basic German grammar and pronunciation; listening, speaking and writing skills.  Throughout the course each student will create a fictional German identity with a German name, German hometown, family, occupation, interests, and so on.  By the end of the course student should be able to travel to Germany and have basic informational conversation with a native speaker!
scorePolicy:
Quiz 1: 10%
In Class Conversation: 20%
Quiz 2: 10%
Mid-Term Exam: 25%
Final Exam: 35%
